item.title: Super Robot Wars Y DLC 1 and 2 participating works announced
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Fuuto PI: The Portrait of Kamen Rider Skull and more.

Publisher Bandai Namco and developer Bandai Namco Forge Digitals have announced the six participating works debuting in Super Robot Wars Y downloadable contents one and two. 

The list of participating works is as follows:

  • Downloadable Content #1: Request from Darkness
    • Galaxy Cyclone Braiger
    • The Big O
    • Fuuto PI: The Portrait of Kamen Rider Skull
  • Downloadable Content #2: Awakening Soul
    • Steel Jeeg
    • Dynamic Planning Original (Getter Robo: The Jet Black Drifter)
    • The Brave Fighter of Legend Da-Garn

Super Robot Wars Y is due out for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 28. A demo is available now for PlayStation 5 and Switch.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC #1 and DLC #2 Reveal Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/super-robot-wars-y-dlc-1-and-2-participating-works-announced

item.title: Otherskin launches September 2
item.content:encoded:
• PC

"Transformative" third-person shooter dated.

“Transformative” third-person shooter Otherskin will launch for PC via Steam on September 2 for $29.99 / €28.99, publisher FDG Entertainment and developer Game Atelier announced. A 15 percent-off discount will be available at launch.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Join Alex on her deadly solo-mission to expose the mysteries of planet Vandermire. Experience a truly transformative third-person shooter and absorb organic abilities to expand your combat and movement capabilities beyond anything you’ve seen before. The entire universe is at stake.

A Mission That’s Expected to Be Your Last

Planet Vandermire, the ancestral home of the extinct “Magna” species, is suspected to be the source of the ever expanding Corruption; a universal threat to all life in the universe. Alex is “lucky” number 13 of volunteering Space Crusaders, ready to give their life in deadly solo-expeditions on the planet’s surface. Mission “Exodus” empowers individuals with a unique high technology AI suit in order to gather as much information as possible, before falling to the Corruption. It is hoped that with each attempt, scientists can increase the time of survival on the surface and find a solution to contain the Corruption.

Key Features

  • Collect Alien Morphs to Expand Your Abilities – While Alex explores the planet, every enemy encounter can change your experience! By absorbing alien “morphs,” you gather new moves and powers that can literally turn the world upside down.
  • Improve Your Unique AI-powered Suit – Upgrade your suit powers and maximize weapon impact, life support and combat agility. The high tech suit includes an AI voice that will help Alex on her journey.
  • Ranged Weapons and Melee Combat – Use your most powerful ranged weapons and combine them with fast close combat moves. It’s a breeze to switch between both.
  • Explore Vandermire – This foreign planet is full of varied biomes. Scout every corner of this beautiful but dangerous alien world in order to collect more information about the origins of the Corruption.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/08/otherskin-launches-september-2
